relevant_findings.heent: NC/AT, PERRL, EOMI, sclerae anicteric, MMM, OP clear.
relevant_findings.lungs: CTA bilat, with some bronchial breath sounds at the bases, R>L.
relevant_findings.heart: PMI non-displaced, RRR, no MRG, nl S1-S2.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Hypoactive BS, soft, TTP in epigastrium, mildly distended. No rebound.
relevant_findings.extremities: WWP, no c/c/e, 2+ peripheral pulses (radials, DPs).
relevant_findings.neuro: Slight tremor in hands. Awake, A&Ox3, CNs II-XII grossly intact, no focal deficits.
